chunks.zh: 一个工具管理所有运行时版本！
chunks.en: One tool to manage all runtime versions!

chunks.zh: 这两天特意补了一下文档。
chunks.en: I specifically updated the documentation in the past two days.

chunks.zh:
文档: [https://vfox.lhan.me/zh-hans/]( https://vfox.lhan.me/zh-hans/)

仓库: [https://github.com/version-fox/vfox]( https://github.com/version-fox/vfox)


目前社区已支持的 SDK:

[![plugins]( https://skillicons.dev/icons?i=java,kotlin,nodejs,flutter,dotnet,python,dart,golang,maven,zig,deno&theme=light)]( https://github.com/version-fox/version-fox-plugins)


主要是可以在 Windows(非 WSL)下, 体验到和 asdf 一样的效果.
chunks.en:
Documentation: [https://vfox.lhan.me/zh-hans/]( https://vfox.lhan.me/zh-hans/)

Repository: [https://github.com/version-fox/vfox]( https://github.com/version-fox/vfox)


Currently supported SDKs by the community:

[![plugins]( https://skillicons.dev/icons?i=java,kotlin,nodejs,flutter,dotnet,python,dart,golang,maven,zig,deno&theme=light)]( https://github.com/version-fox/version-fox-plugins)


The main thing is that you can experience the same effect as asdf under Windows (non-WSL).

chunks.zh: 当然比它要棒哈哈哈哈.
chunks.en: Of course, it's better than it, hahaha.

chunks.zh: 我还以为是右下角右键菜单 > jdk > 1.8,11,17,选择然后切换呢。
chunks.en: I thought it was right-click menu in the lower right corner > jdk > 1.8, 11, 17, select and then switch.

chunks.zh: 敲命令没啥意思
chunks.en: Typing commands is not interesting.

chunks.zh: 牛逼，已 star
chunks.en: Awesome, starred

chunks.zh: @stimw 啊我看到了 支持 Windows
chunks.en: @stimw Ah, I see it now, it supports Windows

chunks.zh: 可以，start 一下，晚点试一下
chunks.en: Okay, start it, I'll try it later.

chunks.zh: 看了网站介绍就觉得想法很不错，下载试了一下，真的好用👍👍👍，以后切换版本太爽了，再也不用翻文件夹了
chunks.en: After reading the website introduction, I thought the idea was very good. I downloaded it and tried it, it's really easy to use 👍👍👍. Switching versions will be so cool in the future, no more digging through folders.

chunks.zh: 有点意思，已 star
chunks.en: Interesting, starred

chunks.zh: @Incrus 不知道我有没有正确理解你的问题, 三种方式吧.
chunks.en: @Incrus I don't know if I understood your question correctly, there are three ways.

chunks.zh: 1.如果内网有 mirror 的话, 可以直接把 nodejs 插件理的地址换成内网地址.
chunks.en: 1. If there is a mirror on the internal network, you can directly change the address of the nodejs plugin to the internal network address.

chunks.zh: 2.因为 vfox 完全依赖插件来获取数据源的, 没办法直接通过命令导入安装包, 但是可以实现一个插件, 插件里面指定离线安装包的位置, 供 vfox 管理
chunks.en: 2. Because vfox completely relies on plugins to obtain data sources, there is no way to directly import the installation package through commands, but you can implement a plugin, and specify the location of the offline installation package in the plugin for vfox to manage.

chunks.zh: 3.vfox 最终管理的是$HOME/.version-fox/cache 目录下的文件, 另一种方法是直接把安装包丢进去就行了
chunks.en: 3. vfox ultimately manages the files in the $HOME/.version-fox/cache directory, another way is to directly throw the installation package into it.

chunks.zh: gentoo 的 eselect ？
chunks.en: Gentoo's eselect?

chunks.zh: 👍 新环境果断上这个方案，现在的工作环境已经用了不同的工具管理版本，折腾起来太费事，先不动了
chunks.en: 👍 I'll definitely use this solution for new environments. The current work environment already uses different tools to manage versions, which is too much trouble, so I'll leave it as is.

chunks.zh: 合 nvm 的区别是这个可以管理更多的工具吗？
chunks.en: Is the difference between this and nvm that this can manage more tools?

chunks.zh: 只针对 npm 来说，功能和 nvm 一样?
chunks.en: Speaking only for npm, are the functions the same as nvm?

chunks.zh: 已 star
chunks.en: Starred

chunks.zh: plugin 的管理和 sdk 的管理容易弄混，建议参考 docker container 和 docker image 这样的子命令设计来区分开。
chunks.en: Plugin management and SDK management are easily confused. It is recommended to refer to the subcommand designs of docker container and docker image to distinguish them.

chunks.zh: 我先是 add 了 java/adoptium-jdk ，然后尝试安装 v21 ，因为下载慢就中途退出了，然后尝试 remove 命令去掉这个 plugin ，得到错误信息 "java/adoptium-jdk not installed"。
chunks.en: I first added java/adoptium-jdk, and then tried to install v21, but exited halfway because the download was slow, and then tried to remove the plugin, but got the error message "java/adoptium-jdk not installed".

chunks.zh: 那么我想换另一个源，执行 "vfox add java/azul-jdk" 时，也得到错误信息 "plugin java already exists"，现在是进退不能了。
chunks.en: So I wanted to switch to another source and executed "vfox add java/azul-jdk", but also got the error message "plugin java already exists", now I can't move forward or backward.

chunks.zh: 反馈下：下载因为网络问题阻塞，Ctrl+C 后，安装未成功显示成功。
chunks.en: Feedback: The download was blocked due to network issues. After Ctrl+C, the installation was not successful but displayed as successful.

chunks.zh: 我已经通过删除 cache 解决，但程序能做优化更好。
chunks.en: I have solved it by deleting the cache, but the program can be optimized better.

chunks.zh: 很牛，比 scoop reset 方便多了，已 star ，明天上班试试
chunks.en: Very awesome, more convenient than scoop reset, starred, I'll try it tomorrow at work.

chunks.zh: 很有想象力，感觉可以支持一下。
chunks.en: Very imaginative, I feel I can support it.

chunks.zh: 挺好用的
chunks.en: Pretty easy to use

chunks.zh: bug:1. 每次使用 vfox use [email protected] -g, 都会在%PATH%创建一条记录.
chunks.en: bug: 1. Every time I use vfox use [email protected] -g, a record will be created in %PATH%.

chunks.zh: 会导致很多重复记录???
chunks.en: Will cause many duplicate records???

chunks.zh: 2. 每次没有 pip, 因为%PATH%缺少 C:\Users\xx\.version-fox\cache\python\v-3.12.2\python-3.12.2\Scripts
chunks.en: 2. No pip every time, because %PATH% is missing C:\Users\xx\.version-fox\cache\python\v-3.12.2\python-3.12.2\Scripts

chunks.zh: 加油，感觉很有用
chunks.en: Come on, I feel it's very useful

chunks.zh: 用了一下，有几个 bug1.
chunks.en: Used it, there are a few bugs 1.

chunks.zh: .tool-versions 文件是在.version-fox 下的。
chunks.en: .tool-versions file is under .version-fox.

chunks.zh: 但是执行 vfox current ，结果都是 N/A3.
chunks.en: But executing vfox current, the results are all N/A 3.

chunks.zh: 如果把.tool-versions 移动到~/目录下，vfox current 正常了，但是每次执行 where python ，.version-fox 下的 python path 都会多一条2. vscode 终端里，查看 echo $PATH, 所以的 path 会重复 2 遍
chunks.en: If I move .tool-versions to the ~/ directory, vfox current is normal, but every time I execute where python, there will be an extra python path under .version-fox. 2. In the vscode terminal, viewing echo $PATH, all paths are repeated twice.

chunks.zh: star ，目前大多数管理工具都不支持原生 win ，加油 👋
chunks.en: Star, most management tools do not support native win, come on 👋
